#  Black Orchid Mobile Bar

Located in Cleveland, OH, Black Orchid Bar Services LLC serves a variety of
delicious drink items for your mobile bar needs. We specialize in beverage
catering for your special events like Birthdays, Weddings, Bridal and Baby
Showers and so much more!

  
We look forward to serving you.

##

Weddings

We would love to help make your special day extra special!

Learn More

##

Parties

Whether it is a party at your house or at a corporate event, we at Black
Orchid know how to have a good time!

Learn More

##

Local Events

Check us out at local events around town such as festivals, private events,
concerts, etc.

Learn More
